subject: Cannot login to my account
description: I've been trying to login for the past 2 hours but keep getting 'invalid credentials' error. I'm certain my password is correct. Please help urgently!

subject: Monthly invoice missing
description: I haven't received my monthly invoice for January. Can you resend it to my email? I need it for expense reporting.

subject: API returning 500 errors
description: Our production API started returning 500 errors about 30 minutes ago. Error logs show database connection timeouts. This is affecting all our customers!

subject: Dark mode feature request
description: Would love to see a dark mode option in the dashboard. It would be much easier on the eyes during late night work sessions.

subject: Button not working on mobile
description: The submit button on the checkout page doesn't respond when tapped on mobile devices. Tested on both iOS and Android.

subject: How do I export my data?
description: I need to export all my customer data for backup purposes. Can't find the export option in the dashboard.

subject: Charged twice for subscription
description: My credit card was charged twice this month for the same subscription. Transaction IDs: TXN123456 and TXN123457. Need immediate refund!

subject: Password reset email not arriving
description: Clicked 'forgot password' multiple times but the reset email never arrives. Checked spam folder - nothing there. Using rachel.kumar@tech.io

subject: Dashboard loading very slowly
description: The main dashboard takes 30+ seconds to load. This started happening after yesterday's update. Other pages load fine.

subject: Can I change my plan mid-month?
description: Interested in upgrading from Basic to Pro plan. Will I be charged the full amount or prorated for the remaining days?

subject: Webhook notifications not working
description: Configured webhooks 3 days ago but not receiving any notifications. Endpoint URL is correct and accessible. Tested with webhook.site.

subject: Love the new interface!
description: Just wanted to say the new UI update is fantastic! Much cleaner and easier to navigate. Keep up the great work!

subject: Cannot delete old projects
description: Trying to delete some old projects to free up space but getting 'Permission Denied' error. I'm the account owner so should have full access.

subject: Bulk user import feature
description: Need ability to import users in bulk via CSV. Currently have to add 200+ users manually which is very time consuming.

subject: Account locked after failed logins
description: My account was locked after 3 failed login attempts. How do I unlock it? Very urgent as I have a client presentation in 1 hour!

subject: Incorrect tax calculation
description: The invoice shows incorrect tax amount. Should be 8.5% sales tax but showing 10%. Please correct and resend invoice.

subject: File upload fails for large files
description: Cannot upload files larger than 10MB. Progress bar reaches 100% then shows error 'Upload failed'. Tried different browsers.

subject: Integration with Slack
description: Would be great to have Slack integration to get notifications for important events. This would improve our team's workflow significantly.

subject: Database backup frequency
description: What is your backup frequency? Need to ensure our data is backed up at least daily for compliance requirements.

subject: 502 Bad Gateway error
description: Getting 502 Bad Gateway error when accessing the reports section. Started happening about 15 minutes ago. All other sections work fine.

subject: Discount code not working
description: Applied discount code SAVE20 at checkout but it says 'Invalid code'. The promotion email says it's valid until end of month.

subject: Two-factor authentication setup
description: Trying to enable 2FA but not receiving the verification codes on my phone. Tried both SMS and authenticator app methods.

subject: Memory leak in latest version
description: After updating to v2.1.0 the application's memory usage keeps growing. Reaches 4GB+ after a few hours. Had to rollback to v2.0.5.

subject: API rate limit increase request
description: Current rate limit of 100 req/min is too low for our usage. We're hitting limits during peak hours. Can we increase to 500 req/min?

subject: What's your uptime SLA?
description: Evaluating your service for enterprise use. Need to know your uptime SLA and incident response times. Also disaster recovery procedures?

subject: Unauthorized charge on card
description: There's a charge of $99.99 on my card from your company but I never signed up for any service. Please refund immediately and investigate.

subject: Session timeout too short
description: Keep getting logged out every 15 minutes. Very disruptive when working on long tasks. Can the session timeout be increased?

subject: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: iOS app crashes immediately on startup after latest update. iPhone 13 Pro running iOS 17.2. Tried reinstalling but same issue.

subject: Export to PDF feature
description: Need ability to export reports as PDF instead of just CSV. Would be very useful for sharing with non-technical stakeholders.

subject: Account migration assistance
description: Need help migrating data from our old system. Have about 50k records. Is there a migration tool or service you provide?

subject: Email notifications too frequent
description: Getting notification emails every few minutes. Would prefer a daily digest or ability to customize notification frequency.

subject: Refund processing time
description: Requested refund 10 days ago but haven't received it yet. Ticket #9876 submitted. When can I expect the refund to be processed?

subject: Cannot access shared workspace
description: Was added to a shared workspace but getting 'Access Denied' when trying to open it. Other team members can access it fine.

subject: Search function not working properly
description: Search returns no results even for exact matches. Tried clearing cache and different browsers but issue persists.

subject: SSO integration with Azure AD
description: Need to integrate SSO with our Azure Active Directory for enterprise deployment. Is this supported in your Enterprise plan?

subject: Privacy policy questions
description: Have some questions about data retention and GDPR compliance. Need clarification on how long you store user data.

subject: Server outage compensation
description: There was a 4-hour outage last week that disrupted our business. What compensation or credit will be provided per the SLA?

subject: API documentation outdated
description: The API docs show endpoints that no longer exist and missing several new endpoints. Please update the documentation.

subject: Duplicate notifications bug
description: Receiving duplicate push notifications for the same event. Sometimes get the same notification 3-4 times.

subject: Custom branding options
description: Would like to add our company logo and colors to the interface. Is white-labeling available in any of your plans?
